description: Kafka Consumer Java client metrics for Redpanda

options.content:
# Note
This dashboard requires a JMX agent reporting statistics from a Kafka Java consumer into Prometheus.

panels.description: The number of commit calls per second .
panels.title: Commit rate

panels.description: The average time in ms a request was throttled by a broker.
panels.title: Average fetch throttle time

panels.description: The number of total rebalance events per hour, both successful and unsuccessful rebalance attempts.
panels.title: Rebalance rate per hour

panels.description: The average number of bytes consumed per second
panels.title: Bytes consumed rate

panels.description: The average number of records consumed per second.
panels.title: Rate of records consumed

panels.description: The average number of bytes consumed per topic per second.
panels.title: Bytes consumed rate per topic

panels.description: The average number of records consumed per second per topic.
panels.title: Rate of records consumed per topic

panels.description: The number of fetch requests per second.
panels.title: Fetch request rate

panels.description: The number of bytes fetched per request for a topic
panels.title: Fetch size

panels.description: The average time taken for a fetch request.
panels.title: Fetch latency average

panels.description: The average time taken for a commit request
panels.title: Commit latency average

panels.description: The number of commit calls per second .
panels.title: Commit rate

title: Kafka Consumer
